mapper.select:
SELECT JEW_MDIS_SNO ,MDIS_NUM ,MDIS_TYPE ,MDIS_KOR_NM ,MDIS_EN_NM ,DATA_OF_FORM ,PROJECT_KOR_NM ,PROJECT_EN_NM ,PI ,CO_PI ,ORGANIZATION ,SUPPORTING_ORGANIZATION ,COPYRIGHT_HOLDER ,INVESTIGATE_PURPOSE ,INVESTIGATE_CONTENT ,KEYWORD ,COLLECTION_STR_DAY ,COLLECTION_END_DAY ,INVESTIGATE_AREA ,ANALYSIS_UNIT ,SUBJECT ,MDIS_TIME ,RESEARCH_ORGANIZATION ,INTERVIEW_SURVEY ,SELF_ADMINISTERED_SURVEY ,MAIL_SURVEY ,PHONE_SURVEY ,ONLINE_SURVEY ,ETC_SURVEY ,EXTRACTION ,CASE_NUMBER ,WEIGHT ,DATA_FORM ,DATA_STRUCTURE ,MDIS_LANGUAGE ,PUBLIC_YN ,PUBLIC_REASONS ,REMARK ,ETC ,DATA_FILE ,USE_YN ,DELETE_YN ,REG_DT ,REG_ID ,MOD_DT ,MOD_ID FROM JEW_MDIS WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN ='Y' AND DELETE_YN ='N'
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM JEW_MDIS WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN ='Y' AND DELETE_YN ='N'

SELECT JEW_MDIS_SNO ,MDIS_NUM ,MDIS_TYPE ,MDIS_KOR_NM ,MDIS_EN_NM ,DATA_OF_FORM ,PROJECT_KOR_NM ,PROJECT_EN_NM ,PI ,CO_PI ,ORGANIZATION ,SUPPORTING_ORGANIZATION ,COPYRIGHT_HOLDER ,INVESTIGATE_PURPOSE ,INVESTIGATE_CONTENT ,KEYWORD ,COLLECTION_STR_DAY ,COLLECTION_END_DAY ,INVESTIGATE_AREA ,ANALYSIS_UNIT ,SUBJECT ,MDIS_TIME ,RESEARCH_ORGANIZATION ,INTERVIEW_SURVEY ,SELF_ADMINISTERED_SURVEY ,MAIL_SURVEY ,PHONE_SURVEY ,ONLINE_SURVEY ,ETC_SURVEY ,EXTRACTION ,CASE_NUMBER ,WEIGHT ,DATA_FORM ,DATA_STRUCTURE ,MDIS_LANGUAGE ,PUBLIC_YN ,PUBLIC_REASONS ,REMARK ,ETC ,DATA_FILE ,USE_YN ,DELETE_YN ,REG_DT ,REG_ID ,MOD_DT ,MOD_ID FROM JEW_MDIS WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN ='Y' AND DELETE_YN ='N' AND JEW_MDIS_SNO =#{jewMdisSno}
